com.brainacad.azarenko.airport.actions

Class Admin

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.brainacad.azarenko.airport.actions.Admin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ManagementSystem

    public class Admin
extends java.lang.Object
implements ManagementSystem
    Class Admin contains the most wide set of actions by implementing all methods of ManagementSystem interface without throwing UnsupportedOperationException.
    Version:
    1.0*
    Author:
    Lyudmila Azarenko
    See Also:
    ManagementSystem

        private static int matches
        Another counter variable of primitive type for methods which implement searching algorithm.

      • structuredArrivals

        private java.util.Collection<java.lang.String[]> structuredArrivals
        Checking collection consists of String one-dimensional array. The array contains records about arrivals. Used to find a parameter of new JTable object.

      • structuredDepartures

        private java.util.Collection<java.lang.String[]> structuredDepartures
        Checking collection consists of String one-dimensional array. The array contains records about departures. Used to find a parameter of new JTable object.

      • sortedByFlightPassengers

        private java.util.Collection<java.lang.String[]> sortedByFlightPassengers
        Checking collection consists of String one-dimensional array. The array contains records about passengers. Used to find a parameter of new JTable object.

      • numberOfPassengers

        private int numberOfPassengers()
        Returns:
        int Method calculates passenger ID so that to create a new record in Passengers table of the database. Administrator doesn't fill in a field with this information manually.
